info.title: Shopware Store API
info.description: This endpoint reference contains an overview of all endpoints comprising the Shopware Store API

links.description: Link members related to the primary data.

included.description: To reduce the number of HTTP requests, servers **MAY** allow responses that include related resources along with the requested primary resources. Such responses are called "compound documents".

meta.description: Non-standard meta-information that can not be represented as an attribute or relationship.

data.description: The document's "primary data" is a representation of the resource or collection of resources targeted by a request.

oneOf.description: An array of resource objects, an array of resource identifier objects, or an empty array ([]), for requests that target resource collections.

resource.description: "Resource objects" appear in a JSON API document to represent resources.

relationshipLinks.description: A resource object **MAY** contain references to other resource objects ("relationships"). Relationships may be to-one or to-many. Relationships can be specified by including a member in a resource's links object.

allOf.description: A `self` member, whose value is a URL for the relationship itself (a "relationship URL"). This URL allows the client to directly manipulate the relationship. For example, it would allow a client to remove an `author` from an `article` without deleting the people resource itself.

link.description: A link **MUST** be represented as either: a string containing the link's URL or a link object.

oneOf.description: A string containing the link's URL.

href.description: A string containing the link's URL.

attributes.description: Members of the attributes object ("attributes") represent information about the resource object in which it's defined.

relationships.description: Members of the relationships object ("relationships") represent references from the resource object in which it's defined to other resource objects.

allOf.description: References to other resource objects in a to-one ("relationship"). Relationships can be specified by including a member in a resource's links object.

relationshipToMany.description: An array of objects each containing \"type\" and \"id\" members for to-many relationships.

jsonapi.description: An object describing the server's implementation

id.description: A unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

status.description: The HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

code.description: An application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem. It **SHOULD NOT** change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

description.description: A human-readable description of the problem.

pointer.description: A JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document [e.g. "/data" for a primary data object, or "/data/attributes/title" for a specific attribute].

parameter.description: A string indicating which query parameter caused the error.

default.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

afterCategoryId.description: Unique identity of the category under which the new category is to be created.

mediaId.description: Unique identity of media added to identify category.

displayNestedProducts.description: Shows nested categories on a product category page.

level.description: An integer value that denotes the level of nesting of a particular category located in an hierarchical category tree.

path.description: A relative URL to the category.

productAssignmentType.description: Type of product assignment: Dynamic product group as or `product_stream` or Manual assignment as `product`.

visible.description: Displays categories on category page when true.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the category is listed for selection.

cmsPageIdSwitched.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

visibleChildCount.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

seoUrl.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

children.description: Child categories within this category for hierarchical navigation

tags.description: Tags for organizing and filtering categories

cmsPage.description: CMS page layout for the category

seoUrls.description: SEO-friendly URLs for the category across different sales channels

path.description: A relative URL to the category.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the category is listed for selection.

position.description: Order of the block indicated by number like 0, 1, 2,...

type.description: Type of block can be 'image`, `text`, 'product-listing`, `image-two-column`, etc.

name.description: Unique name of the CMS Block.

sectionPosition.description: Position of the section. It can either be `main` or `sidebar`.

marginTop.description: Defines the margin area on the top of an element.

marginBottom.description: Defines for the margin area on the bottom of an element.

marginLeft.description: Defines for the margin area on the left of an element.

marginRight.description: Defines the margin area on the right of an element.

backgroundColor.description: Defines the background color of an element.

cssClass.description: One or more CSS classes added and separated by spaces.

entity.description: This field will be implemented in the future.

cssClass.description: One or more CSS classes added and separated by spaces.

previewMediaId.description: Unique identity of media to be previewed.

sections.description: Content sections within the CMS page (layout blocks containing slots)

previewMedia.description: Preview image for the CMS page in admin panel and page selection

landingPages.description: Landing pages using this CMS layout

position.description: Position of occurrence of each section denoted by numerical values 0, 1, 2...

type.description: Types of sections can be `sidebar` or `fullwidth`.

name.description: Name of the CMS section defined.

mobileBehavior.description: Hides the sidebar on mobile viewports. It can hold values such as 'mobile', 'wrap', any other string or be unset.

backgroundMediaId.description: Unique identity of CMS section's background media.

backgroundMediaMode.description: Background media mode can be `cover`, `auto` or `contain`.

cssClass.description: One or more CSS classes added and separated by spaces.

pageId.description: Unique identity of page where CMS section is defined.

type.description: It indicates the types of content that can be defined within the slot which includes `image`, `text`, `form`, `product-listing`, `category-navigation`, `product-box`, `buy-box`, `sidebar-filter`, etc.

slot.description: Key-value pair to configure which element to be shown in which slot.

blockId.description: Unique identity of CMS block where slot is defined.

iso.description: Internationally recognized two-letter country codes. For example, DE, IN, NO, etc.

position.description: Numerical value that indicates the order in which the defined countries must be displayed in the frontend.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the country is available for selection in the storefront.

shippingAvailable.description: The shipping availability for a country is enabled when boolean value is `true`.

iso3.description: Internationally recognized three-letter country codes. For example, DEU, IND, NOR, etc.

displayStateInRegistration.description: The country's state is displayed in the address when boolean value is `true`.

forceStateInRegistration.description: State details in the address are force included when boolean value is `true`.

checkVatIdPattern.description: Verify if VAT ID is valid or not.

vatIdRequired.description: Set to true, if VAT ID is to be made mandatory.

vatIdPattern.description: Unique VAT ID with country code and numbers, for example - GB999 9999

postalCodeRequired.description: The postal code is made mandatory specification in the address, when boolean value is `true`.

checkPostalCodePattern.description: Verify for valid postal code pattern.

checkAdvancedPostalCodePattern.description: Verify for advanced postal code pattern.

advancedPostalCodePattern.description: Wildcard formatted zip codes to allow easy searching in the frontend based on initial constants, for example - 24****, 1856**.

defaultPostalCodePattern.description: Default pattern of postal or zip code.

forceStateInRegistration.description: State details in the address are force included when boolean value is `true`.

checkAdvancedPostalCodePattern.description: Verify for advanced postal code pattern.

defaultPostalCodePattern.description: Default pattern of postal or zip code.

shortCode.description: An abbreviation for the country's state.

position.description: Numerical value that indicates the order in which the defined states must be displayed in the frontend.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the country's state is available for selection in the storefront.

shortCode.description: An abbreviation for the country's state.

position.description: Numerical value that indicates the order in which the defined states must be displayed in the frontend.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the country's state is available for selection in the storefront.

symbol.description: A currency symbol is a graphical representation used as shorthand for a currency's name, for example US Dollar - $

isoCode.description: Standard international three digit code to represent currency. For example, USD.

position.description: The order of the tabs for multiple currencies defined.

isSystemDefault.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

taxFreeFrom.description: The value from which the tax must be exempted.

symbol.description: A currency symbol is a graphical representation used as shorthand for a currency's name, for example US Dollar - $

isoCode.description: Standard international three digit code to represent currency. For example, USD.

position.description: The order of the tabs for multiple currencies defined.

lastPaymentMethodId.description: Unique identity of previous payment method.

defaultBillingAddressId.description: Unique identity of default billing address.

defaultShippingAddressId.description: Unique identity of default shipping address.

customerNumber.description: Unique  number assigned to identity a customer.

title.description: Titles or honorifics like Mr, Mrs, etc.

affiliateCode.description: An affiliate code is an identification option with which website operators can mark outgoing links.

campaignCode.description: A campaign code is the globally unique identifier for a campaign.

active.description: To keep the status of the customer active, the boolean value is set to `true`.

doubleOptInRegistration.description: Set to `true` to allow user subscriptions to an email marketing list.

doubleOptInEmailSentDate.description: Date and time when the double opt-in email was sent.

doubleOptInConfirmDate.description: Date and time when the double opt-in email was confirmed.

guest.description: Boolean value is `true` if it is to be a guest account.

firstLogin.description: To capture date and time of customer's first login.

lastLogin.description: To capture date and time of customer's last login.

orderCount.description: Captures the number of orders placed.

orderTotalAmount.description: Sum of total amount to be paid.

reviewCount.description: Number of reviews the customer has given.

group.description: Customer group determining pricing and permissions

lastPaymentMethod.description: Last used payment method by the customer

defaultBillingAddress.description: Default billing address for the customer

activeBillingAddress.description: Currently active billing address in the session

defaultShippingAddress.description: Default shipping address for the customer

activeShippingAddress.description: Currently active shipping address in the session

addresses.description: All addresses saved for the customer

tags.description: Tags assigned to the customer for organization and segmentation

zipcode.description: Postal or zip code of customer's address.

title.description: Titles given to customer like Dr. , Prof., etc

hash.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

isDefaultBillingAddress.description: Added since version: 6.7.7.0. Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

isDefaultShippingAddress.description: Added since version: 6.7.7.0. Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

zipcode.description: Postal or zip code of customer's address.

title.description: Titles given to customer like Dr. , Prof., etc

hash.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

isDefaultBillingAddress.description: Added since version: 6.7.7.0. Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

isDefaultShippingAddress.description: Added since version: 6.7.7.0. Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

displayGross.description: If boolean value is `true` gross value is displayed else, net value will be displayed to the customer.

registrationActive.description: To enable the registration of partner customer group.

unit.description: Unit in which the delivery time is defined. For example, days or hours.

documentTypeId.description: Unique identity of the document type.

logoId.description: Unique identity of the company logo.

filenamePrefix.description: A prefix name added to the file name separated by an underscore.

filenameSuffix.description: A suffix name added to the file name separated by an underscore.

global.description: When set to `true`, the document can be used across all sales channels.

documentNumber.description: Unique number associated with every document.

logo.description: Logo in the document at the top-right corner.

documentBaseConfigId.description: Unique identity of document's base config.

cmsPage.description: CMS page layout for the landing page

seoUrls.description: SEO-friendly URLs for the landing page across different sales channels

cmsPage.description: CMS page layout for the landing page

seoUrls.description: SEO-friendly URLs for the landing page across different sales channels

locale.description: Locale defining regional settings (date, time, number formats)

children.description: Child languages inheriting from this parent language

locale.description: Locale defining regional settings (date, time, number formats)

children.description: Child languages inheriting from this parent language

code.description: Code given to the locale. For example: en-CA.

salesChannelId.description: Unique identity of the sales channel.
Unique identity of the sales channel.

mimeType.description: A string sent along with a file indicating the type of the file. For example: image/jpeg.

fileExtension.description: Type of file indication. For example: jpeg, png.

uploadedAt.description: Date and time at which media was added.

fileName.description: Name of the media file uploaded.

fileSize.description: Size of the file media file uploaded.

url.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

hasFile.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

private.description: When `true`, the media display is kept private.

thumbnails.description: Generated thumbnail images in various sizes

url.description: Public url of media thumbnail. Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

orderNumber.description: Unique number associated with every order.

billingAddressId.description: Unique identity of the billing address.

salesChannelId.description: Unique identity of the sales channel.

orderDateTime.description: Timestamp when the order was placed.

orderDate.description: Date when the order was placed.

positionPrice.description: Price of each line item in the cart multiplied by its quantity excluding charges like shipping cost, rules, taxes etc.

shippingTotal.description: Total shipping cost of the ordered product.

currencyFactor.description: Rate at which currency is exchanged.

deepLinkCode.description: It is a generated special code linked to email. It is used to access orders placed by guest customers.

affiliateCode.description: An affiliate code is an identification option with which website operators can mark outgoing links.

campaignCode.description: A campaign code is the globally unique identifier for a campaign.

source.description: Source of orders either via normal order placement or subscriptions.

stateMachineState.description: Current order state (e.g., open, in_progress, completed, cancelled)

primaryOrderDelivery.description: Primary delivery information for the order

primaryOrderTransaction.description: Primary payment transaction for the order

orderCustomer.description: Customer information associated with the order

language.description: Language used when placing the order

addresses.description: All addresses associated with the order (billing and shipping)

deliveries.description: Delivery information including shipping address and tracking

documents.description: Generated documents (invoices, delivery notes, credit notes)

tags.description: Tags assigned to the order for organization and filtering

title.description: Title name given to customer like DR. , Prof., etc.

hash.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

title.description: Title name given to the customer like Dr, prof. etc.

customerNumber.description: Unique number assigned to the customer.

shippingOrderAddressId.description: Unique identity of order's shipping address.

shippingDateEarliest.description: Date and time of earliest delivery of products.

shippingDateLatest.description: Date and time of latest delivery of products.

stateMachineState.description: Current delivery state (e.g., open, shipped, delivered, cancelled)

shippingMethod.description: Shipping method used for this delivery

positions.description: Line items included in this delivery

orderLineItemId.description: Unique identity of line items in an order.

unitPrice.description: Price of product per item (where, quantity=1).

totalPrice.description: Cost of product based on quantity.

quantity.description: Number of items of each product.

identifier.description: It is a unique identity of an item in cart before its converted to an order.

referencedId.description: Unique identity of type of entity.

label.description: It is a typical product name given to the line item.

good.description: When set to true, it indicates the line item is physical else it is virtual.

removable.description: Allows the line item to be removable from the cart when set to true.

stackable.description: Allows to change the quantity of the line item when set to true.

position.description: Position of line items placed in an order.

unitPrice.description: Price of product per item (where, quantity=1).

totalPrice.description: Cost of product based on quantity.

description.description: Description of line items in an order.

type.description: Type refers to the entity type of an item whether it is product or promotion for instance.

product.description: Referenced product if this is a product line item

orderDeliveryPositions.description: Delivery positions for this line item

downloads.description: Digital downloads associated with this line item

orderLineItemId.description: Unique identity of Order line item.

position.description: The order of downloaded digital products displayed in the storefront by mentioning numerical values like 1,2,3, etc.

accessGranted.description: When boolean value is `true`, the digital product is allowed to download.

stateMachineState.description: Current payment transaction state (e.g., open, paid, cancelled)

paymentMethod.description: Payment method used for this transaction

captureId.description: Unique identity of order transaction capture.

reason.description: Reason for refunding the amount for an order.

refundId.description: Unique identity of order transaction capture refund.

orderLineItemId.description: Unique identity of order line item.

reason.description: Reason for refunding the amount for an order.

quantity.description: Quantity of line item to be refunded.

position.description: The order of the tabs of your defined payment methods in the storefront by entering numerical values like 1,2,3, etc.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the payment methods are available for selection in the storefront.

afterOrderEnabled.description: When set to true, customers are redirected to the payment options page to choose a new payment method on order failure.

shortName.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

media.description: Payment method logo or icon image

position.description: The order of the tabs of your defined payment methods in the storefront by entering numerical values like 1,2,3, etc.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the payment methods are available for selection in the storefront.

afterOrderEnabled.description: When set to true, customers are redirected to the payment options page to choose a new payment method on order failure.

shortName.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

media.description: Payment method logo or icon image

coverId.description: Unique identity of a ProductMedia item used as product cover.

productNumber.description: Unique number assigned to individual products. Define rules for automatic assignment of every product creation as per your number range.

restockTime.description: The restock time in days indicates how long it will take until a sold out item is back in stock.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the products are available for selection in the storefront for purchase.

available.description: Indicates weather the product is available or not.

isCloseout.description: When the value is set to true, the product is hidden when sold out.

availableStock.description: Indicates the number of products still available. This value results from the stock minus the open orders.

stock.description: Indicates the number of products available.

displayGroup.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

manufacturerNumber.description: Unique number that describes the manufacturer.

purchaseSteps.description: Specifies the scales in which the item is to be offered. For example, a scale of 2 means that your customers can purchase 2, 4, 6 products, etc., but not 1, 3 or 5.

maxPurchase.description: Maximum number of items that can be purchased.

minPurchase.description: Minimum number of items that can be purchased.

purchaseUnit.description: Quantity of the item purchased. For example, 500ml, 2kg, etc.

referenceUnit.description: Price of purchased item calculated as per the reference unit. Say, you bought 500ml of milk and the price is calculated in reference to 1000ml.

shippingFree.description: Indicates weather the shipping price is free or not.

markAsTopseller.description: Indicates weather the product is top seller or not.

releaseDate.description: The release date of a product or product model. This can be used to distinguish the exact variant of a product.

type.description: The type of the product, e.g., physical or digital.

calculatedMaxPurchase.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

isNew.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

downloads.description: Downloadable files associated with the product (e.g., manuals, digital content)

children.description: Product variants that inherit from this parent product

deliveryTime.description: Estimated delivery time for the product

unit.description: Product unit of measure (e.g., piece, liter, kg)

cover.description: Main product image displayed in listings and detail pages

cmsPage.description: Custom CMS page layout for the product detail page

canonicalProduct.description: Canonical product reference for variant consolidation and SEO purposes

crossSellings.description: Cross-selling configurations (related products, accessories, similar items)

configuratorSettings.description: Variant configurator settings defining available options for product variants

productReviews.description: Customer reviews and ratings for the product

mainCategories.description: Primary category assignments per sales channel for SEO and navigation

seoUrls.description: SEO-friendly URLs for the product across different sales channels

options.description: Product variant options (e.g., size, color) that define different variants

properties.description: Product properties and characteristics for filtering

categories.description: Categories this product is assigned to

streams.description: Dynamic product streams this product belongs to based on defined filters

categoriesRo.description: Read-only category tree including all parent categories for optimized queries

tags.description: Tags for organizing and filtering products

seoCategory.description: Main category used for SEO URL generation in the current sales channel

options.description: Product variant options (e.g., size, color) that define different variants

properties.description: Product properties and characteristics for filtering

categories.description: Categories this product is assigned to

streams.description: Dynamic product streams this product belongs to based on defined filters

categoriesRo.description: Read-only category tree including all parent categories for optimized queries

tags.description: Tags for organizing and filtering products

seoCategory.description: Main category used for SEO URL generation in the current sales channel

position.description: The order of the tabs of your defined product configuration settings in the storefront by entering numerical values like 1,2,3, etc.
The order of the tabs of your defined cross-selling actions in the storefront by entering numerical values like 1,2,3, etc.

sortBy.description: To sort the display of products by name, price or publication (descending, ascending) date.

sortDirection.description: To sort the display of products by ascending or descending order.

type.description: Type of product assignment for cross-selling. It can either be Dynamic product group or Manual assignment.

active.description: When set to active, the cross-selling feature is enabled.

limit.description: The maximum number of products to be displayed in cross-selling on the item detail page of your item.

position.description: The order in which the digital products are downloaded, like 1,2,3, etc.to adjust their order of display.

keyword.description: The keywords that help to search the product.

position.description: The order of the images to be displayed for a product.

salesChannelId.description: Unique identity of the sales channel.

content.description: Short description or subject of the project review.

points.description: A floating point number given to rate a product.

status.description: When status is set, the rating is made visible.

internal.description: When the boolean value is `true` indicating that it is for internal use only and will not appear in product stream listings.

displayType.description: Property groups can be displayed in the form of text, image, dropdown or color.

sortingType.description: Sorting the property group by name or position.

filterable.description: When set to true, the property will be displayed in the product filter of product lists.

visibleOnProductDetailPage.description: When set to true, the property groups are displayed on product detail page.

colorHexCode.description: Property group options can be displayed in the form of color. For example: #98e3f5ff.

combinable.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

paymentMethodId.description: Unique identity of payment method used.

navigationCategoryDepth.description: It determines the number of levels of subcategories in the storefront category menu.

mailHeaderFooterId.description: Unique identity of mail header and footer.

shortName.description: A short name for sales channel.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the sales channel is enabled.

hreflangActive.description: When set to true, the sales channel pages are available in different languages.

maintenance.description: When `true`, it indicates that the sales channel is undergoing maintenance, and shopping is temporarily unavailable during this period.

language.description: Default language for the sales channel

currency.description: Default currency for the sales channel

paymentMethod.description: Default payment method for the sales channel

shippingMethod.description: Default shipping method for the sales channel

country.description: Default country for the sales channel

domains.description: Domain URLs configured for the sales channel

url.description: URL of the sales channel domain.

hreflangUseOnlyLocale.description: This is used to toggle the language configurations, say between DE and DE-DE for instance.

salutationKey.description: Technical name given to salutation. For example: mr
Technical name given to salutation. For example: mr

foreignKey.description: The key that references to product or category entity ID.

routeName.description: A destination routeName that has been registered somewhere in the app's router. For example: \\"frontend.detail.page\\"

pathInfo.description: Path to product URL. For example: \\"/detail/bbf36734504741c79a3bbe3795b91564\\"

seoPathInfo.description: Seo path to product. For example: \\"Pepper-white-ground-pearl/SW10098\\"

isCanonical.description: When set to true, search redirects to the main URL.

isModified.description: When boolean value is `true`, the seo url is changed.

isDeleted.description: When set to true, the URL is deleted and cannot be used any more but it is still available on table and can be restored later.

error.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

url.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

foreignKey.description: The key that references to product or category entity ID.

routeName.description: A destination routeName that has been registered somewhere in the app's router. For example: \\"frontend.detail.page\\"

pathInfo.description: Path to product URL. For example: \\"/detail/bbf36734504741c79a3bbe3795b91564\\"

seoPathInfo.description: Seo path to product. For example: \\"Pepper-white-ground-pearl/SW10098\\"

isCanonical.description: When set to true, search redirects to the main URL.

isModified.description: When boolean value is `true`, the seo url is changed.

isDeleted.description: When set to true, the URL is deleted and cannot be used any more but it is still available on table and can be restored later.

error.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

url.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

isValid.description: Created SEO URL template can be made usable by setting `isValid` to true.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the shipping methods are available for selection in the storefront.

position.description: The order of the tabs of your defined shipping methods in the storefront by entering numerical values like 1,2,3, etc.

availabilityRule.description: Rule defining when this shipping method is available

prices.description: Shipping prices based on weight, volume, or cart value

media.description: Shipping method logo or carrier image

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the shipping methods are available for selection in the storefront.

position.description: The order of the tabs of your defined shipping methods in the storefront by entering numerical values like 1,2,3, etc.

availabilityRule.description: Rule defining when this shipping method is available

prices.description: Shipping prices based on weight, volume, or cart value

media.description: Shipping method logo or carrier image

calculation.description: Shipping price calculated based on quantity, price, weight or volume of items.

quantityStart.description: Starting range of quantity of an item.

quantityEnd.description: Ending range of quantity of an item.

translationKey.description: Reference to the snippet in the template.

iso.description: ISO nomenclature used to classify languages.

followingNextSchedule.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

delayed.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria.

position.description: The order of the tabs of your defined taxes in the storefront by entering numerical values like 1,2,3, etc. Added since version: 6.4.0.0.

active.description: When boolean value is `true`, the tax providers are available for selection in the storefront.

priority.description: A numerical value to prioritize one of the tax providers from the list.

processUrl.description: External URL makes request to get tax info.

ProductDetailResponse.description: Represents a product along with detailed information required to display a variant selection.

configurator.description: List of property groups with their corresponding options and information on how to display them.

CartDeliveryPosition.description: A list of all cart errors, such as insufficient stocks, invalid addresses or vouchers.

CartDelivery.description: A list of all cart errors, such as insufficient stocks, invalid addresses or vouchers.

from.description: The lower bound of the range

currentFilters.description: Contains the state of the filters. These can be used to create listing filters.

availableSortings.description: Contains the available sorting. These can be used to show a sorting select-box in the product listing.

taxRules.description: Currently active tax rules and/or rates

currentCustomerGroup.description: Customer group of the current user

fallbackCustomerGroup.description: Fallback group if the default customer group is not applicable

taxRules.description: Currently active tax rules and/or rates

context.description: Core context with general configuration values and state

Criteria.description: Search parameters. For more information, see our documentation on [Search Queries](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#structure)

limit.description: Number of items per result page

filter.description: List of filters to restrict the search result. For more information, see [Search Queries > Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#filter)

ids.description: List of ids to search for

query.description: The query string to search for

post-filter.description: Filters that applied without affecting aggregations. For more information, see [Search Queries > Post Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#post-filter)

fields.description: Fields which should be returned in the search result.

NoneFieldsCriteria.description: Search parameters. For more information, see our documentation on [Search Queries](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#structure)

limit.description: Number of items per result page

filter.description: List of filters to restrict the search result. For more information, see [Search Queries > Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#filter)

ids.description: List of ids to search for

query.description: The query string to search for

post-filter.description: Filters that applied without affecting aggregations. For more information, see [Search Queries > Post Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#post-filter)

TotalCountMode.description: Whether the total for the total number of hits should be determined for the search query. none = disabled total count, exact = calculate exact total amount (slow), next-pages = calculate only for next page (fast)

system.description: The measurement system used in the store. 'metric' for metric system, 'imperial' for imperial system.

units.description: Units used in the measurement system.

ContextMeasurementSystemInfo.description: Configuration of the measurement system used in the store, by default including units for length and weight.

system.description: The measurement system used in the store. 'metric' for metric system, 'imperial' for imperial system.

units.description: Units used in the measurement system.

no-aggregations.description: Resets all aggregations in the criteria. This parameter is a flag, the value has no effect.

only-aggregations.description: If this flag is set, no products are fetched. Sorting and associations are also ignored. This parameter is a flag, the value has no effect.

paymentChangeable.description: The key-value pairs contain the uuid of the order as key and a boolean as value, indicating that the payment method can still be changed.

CookieRouteResponse.description: Response containing cookie groups and their configuration hash.

hash.description: Hash of the current cookie configuration. Can be used to detect changes in cookie configuration.

languageId.description: The language ID for which the cookie configuration was generated. Used to store hashes per language.

elements.description: Cookies required for this shop to function:
elements.name: Technically required

elements.description: Cookies used for statistics and shop performance metrics.
elements.name: Statistics

elements.description: Allows Google to collect personal data for online advertising and marketing.
elements.name: Marketing

total.description: The total number of found entities

aggregations.description: Contains aggregated data. A simple example is the determination of the average price from a product search query.

page.description: The actual page. This can be used for pagination.

limit.description: The actual limit. This is used for pagination and goes together with the page.

CartError.description: A list of all cart errors, such as insufficient stocks, invalid addresses or vouchers.

allOf.description: Additional search parameters for product listings

order.description: Specifies the sorting of the products by `availableSortings`. If not set, the default sorting will be set according to the shop settings. The available sorting options are sent within the response under the `availableSortings` key. In order to sort by a field, consider using the `sort` parameter from the listing criteria. Do not use both parameters together, as it might lead to unexpected results.

limit.description: Number of items per result page. If not set, the limit will be set according to the default products per page, defined in the system settings.

manufacturer.description: Filter by manufacturers. List of manufacturer identifiers separated by a `|`.

min-price.description: Filters by a minimum product price. Has to be lower than the `max-price` filter.

max-price.description: Filters by a maximum product price. Has to be higher than the `min-price` filter.

rating.description: Filter products with a minimum average rating.

shipping-free.description: Filters products that are marked as shipping-free.

properties.description: Filters products by their properties. List of property identifiers separated by a `|`.

manufacturer-filter.description: Enables/disabled filtering by manufacturer. If set to false, the `manufacturer` filter will be ignored. Also the `aggregations[manufacturer]` key will be removed from the response.

price-filter.description: Enables/disabled filtering by price. If set to false, the `min-price` and `max-price` filter will be ignored. Also the `aggregations[price]` key will be removed from the response.

rating-filter.description: Enables/disabled filtering by rating. If set to false, the `rating` filter will be ignored. Also the `aggregations[rating]` key will be removed from the response.

shipping-free-filter.description: Enables/disabled filtering by shipping-free products. If set to false, the `shipping-free` filter will be ignored. Also the `aggregations[shipping-free]` key will be removed from the response.

property-filter.description: Enables/disabled filtering by properties products. If set to false, the `properties` filter will be ignored. Also the `aggregations[properties]` key will be removed from the response.

property-whitelist.description: A whitelist of property identifiers which can be used for filtering. List of property identifiers separated by a `|`. The `property-filter` must be `true`, otherwise the whitelist has no effect.

reduce-aggregations.description: By sending the parameter `reduce-aggregations` , the post-filters that were applied by the customer, are also applied to the aggregations. This has the consequence that only values are returned in the aggregations that would lead to further filter results. This parameter is a flag, the value has no effect.

name.description: Name of the cart - for example `guest-cart`

token.description: Context token identifying the cart and the user session

errors.description: A list of all cart errors, such as insufficient stocks, invalid addresses or vouchers.

transactions.description: A list of all payment transactions associated with the current cart.

customerComment.description: A comment that can be added to the cart.

ProductMeasurements.description: Runtime field, cannot be used as part of the criteria. Measurements of a product, including dimensions and weight.

CalculatedPrice.description: Represents a product along with detailed information required to display a variant selection.

taxRules.description: Currently active tax rules and/or rates

criteriaLimit.name: limit
criteriaLimit.description: Number of items per result page

criteriaFilter.name: filter[]
criteriaFilter.description: List of filters to restrict the search result. For more information, see [Search Queries > Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#filter)

criteriaIds.name: ids[]
criteriaIds.description: List of ids to search for

criteriaQuery.name: query
criteriaQuery.description: The query string to search for

criteriaPostFilter.name: post-filter[]
criteriaPostFilter.description: Filters that applied without affecting aggregations. For more information, see [Search Queries > Post Filter](https://shopware.stoplight.io/docs/store-api/docs/concepts/search-queries.md#post-filter)

criteriaFields.name: fields[]
criteriaFields.description: Fields which should be returned in the search result.

criteriaIncludes.name: includes
criteriaIncludes.description: Specify the fields that should be returned for the given entities. Object key needs to be the entity name, and the list of fields needs to be the value. Fields will not be included, if they are also specified in the excludes. Note that the include fields will only be stripped on the API-Level, consider using the `fields` parameter for performance reasons.

criteriaExcludes.name: excludes
criteriaExcludes.description: Specify the fields that should be excluded from the response for the given entities. Object key needs to be the entity name, and the list of fields needs to be the value. Note that the exclude fields will only be stripped on the API-Level, consider using the `fields` parameter for performance reasons.

CompressedCriteria.name: _criteria
CompressedCriteria.description: Compressed and encoded criteria object. Format: base64url(gzip(json_encode(criteria))). This parameter allows passing complex criteria as a single encoded string instead of multiple query parameters. The criteria object should be JSON-encoded, then gzipped, and finally base64url-encoded. The criteria object structure is defined in the Criteria schema (see #/components/schemas/Criteria).

CompressedNoneFieldsCriteria.name: _criteria
CompressedNoneFieldsCriteria.description: Compressed and encoded criteria object. Format: base64url(gzip(json_encode(criteria))). This parameter allows passing complex criteria as a single encoded string instead of multiple query parameters. The criteria object should be JSON-encoded, then gzipped, and finally base64url-encoded. The criteria object structure is defined in the NoneFieldsCriteria schema (see #/components/schemas/NoneFieldsCriteria).

noAggregations.name: no-aggregations
noAggregations.description: Resets all aggregations in the criteria. This parameter is a flag, the value has no effect.

onlyAggregations.name: only-aggregations
onlyAggregations.description: If this flag is set, no products are fetched. Sorting and associations are also ignored. This parameter is a flag, the value has no effect.

ApiKey.name: sw-access-key

ContextToken.description: Identifies an anonymous or identified user session
ContextToken.name: sw-context-token

parameters.description: Budget ID to get statistics for

quoteId.description: Quote ID to calculate statistics for (optional)

400.description: Employee not logged in, missing budget ID, or validation error

tags.name: Experimental
tags.description: Experimental API, not part of our backwards compatibility promise, thus this API can introduce breaking changes at any time.
